name: Existence = Pain
description:
A "story" about a little demon, who lost all of his power on earth. 

He can't live very long and every little move hurts him..

This game was made in under 48 hours for the Ludum Dare competition and can have bugs/glitches.

Controls:

Arrow keys - Move

Space - Jump

You can rate the game on the Ludum Dare website here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/existence-pain
